attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scrap council tax on empty propertys that are up for sale, why should you pay council tax when you are not useing any of the councils services at that property as you will be paying for these services at you new address.
You dont pay for any gas, electric or water if they are turned off so why should the council be able to collect council tax.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
